ctlogo.execute

Interface Context

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractContext, GlobalContext, LocalContext

    public interface Context
    The context where one Expression should run.
    Author:
    Paul Yang

    • Method Summary

      Return the output stream of the context
      Screen getScreen()
      Return the screen of the context

      Return the value of the variable in the context

      Return the variable manager of the context
